assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Institutional review board (IRB) approval for human research was obtained, and the principles outlined in the Declaration of Helsinki were followed.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from the participants involved (University of Southern California (USC) IRB #HS-14-00513-CR002 and Western (IRB) #20120512). The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of the USC approved the animal experiments performed in this study (no. 10885).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
